title: TNT Run Advanced (Cosmetics Update!)
briefDescription: TNT Run Advanced is a minecraft bedrock edition game map made by map maker dynamic zed and addon maker cda94581.Unlike other TNT Run maps ...
Description:
?Time Played: Visible in main lobby.
?Balance coins: Visible when you are inside the shop.
?/function resetmultiplayer? If the multiplayer mode doesn?t auto reset, you can force reset using this command.
?/function resetpractice? If the practice mode doesn?t auto reset, you can force reset using this command.
?/function resetstatistics? type this in chat to reset all statistics such as ?coins? or ?time played?.
?Stand on the specified color glass to use the portals. ?You can also talk to the NPC to teleport ?PvP is always disabled in main lobby
?You will need at least 2 player to start.
?This mode is single player only!

?You will automatically recieve speed and jump boost.
?Try not to fall into the void as long as possible.
?You can try and beat your personal highscore or your friends highscore, and rank up in the leaderboard! ?
Note: you cannot use the LEAP power-up in this mode, totems still work!



Spectator Mode:
?In this mode you can fly around and spectate any on-going game in multiplayer lobby or practice lobby.
?You will recieve a ?Back to Lobby? item as well as switch lobby compass.
?The in-game shop offers a variety of cosmetics to choose from, including effects and awesome powerups to give you a really fun experience and help you win games in multiplayer.
?modification for personal use is allowed
?sharing mcpedl link is allowed
?you are allowed to record on this map for youtube if you mention the below in your description:
Creators: dynamic zed & cda94581
Map Download: (mcpedl link)
?reuploading it with or without credits/ with or without modification- is not allowed
?using our addon in your maps is not allowed
?copy-pasting from our addon files is not allowed
?redistribution of direct downloads is not allowed
?miscrediting is not allowed
we don't use any advertisement links in our downloads, so there is no need for you to provide direct download links.
action will be taken against those that don't abide by the installation policy.

crawledImageUrls.text:
TNT Run Advanced is a minecraft bedrock edition game map made by map maker dynamic zed and addon maker cda94581.
Unlike other TNT Run maps this one offers lots of new and fun features. The map is suitable for both multiplayer and single player.
gamemode to test your skills-
an in-game shop to unlock cool items-
and you can even switch between pvp and no pvp if that?s your thing-

?Coins|Wins|Highscore|Previous Score: Visible in the pause screen.
Admin commands:

?Crouch while holding the ?Back to lobby? item to return to main lobby.
?You can enable/disable pvp while in the multiplayer lobby.
?If you win in this mode you can get upto 10 coins
?right click the compass to switch between multiplayer and spectator lobbies.
Note: all items come at a reasonable price!

title: Fantasy Bedwars 1.0
briefDescription: A world of swords, magic, and blocks. Battle with one another, destroy their beds, and be the last man standing. Collect minerals and gems, trade ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A world of swords, magic, and blocks. Battle with one another, destroy their beds, and be the last man standing. Collect minerals and gems, trade them for blocks and weapons. Build a fortress and conquer others. Be the strongest in this world of fantasy.
This game requires 2-8 players to play.

Gameplay:
All of you will start and pick an island of your own, each contains a different magic style.
When using a magic scroll, this will be what happens based on your magic attribute:

-Black (Darkness)
Blinds nearby enemies for a period of time

-White (Light)
Summons lightning bolt infront of you

-Red (Fire)
Summons a fireball

-Blue (Water)
Traps nearby players inside an obsidian egg filled with water

-Green (Wind)
Levitates you and gives slow falling effect

-Brown (Earth)
Summons evocation fangs around you

-Light Blue (Time)
Makes nearby enemies unable to move for a period of time

title: Bow Wars 0.75
briefDescription: Take aim, and be the greatest archer in this game! Invite friends, and battle one another in this world. Choose a team to side on, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Take aim, and be the greatest archer in this game! Invite friends, and battle one another in this world. Choose a team to side on, and a game mode to fight with. Gather up points to be stronger on the proceeding games. Shoot them all!!
This game requires more than 2 players to be played.
A game where your accuracy is tested. Where you battle one another in team battles. You will start by choosing a game mode. Next, purchase your weapons from the merchants. Then, fight the other team members as you fulfill the gamemodes condition to win.
This map have multiple gamemodes:

-Capture the Block
Win by stealing the other team?s block on top of their tower, then bringing it back to your own team?s tower. Strategize, and plan on how to defend and attack. Teamwork makes the dream work!

-Terrorist Attack
Each team will have its own goal. The blue team (Counter terrorist) will have to stop the other team from planting and exploding the bomb. The red team (Terrorist) will have to either kill every member of the other team, or make sure they plant the bomb and wait till it explode. Accuracy is the key, and the team who won three rounds will be the victor of the game.

-Team Death Match
Win by killing members of the other team 15 times. Be sneaky! Be stealthy! Be deadly!
By winning games, you will gain gems. These gems can be used to buy weapons and miscellenous items for you next ganes

title: KitPVP Advance v2.7
briefDescription: Invite your friends and have an epic battle within this world! Where you choose your own characters and fight with one another to gain experience ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Invite your friends and have an epic battle within this world! Where you choose your own characters and fight with one another to gain experience and money!! More experience and money, more chances of winning!! Download this map and see who is the greatest gladiator within your circle of friends!!
In this world, you will fight with your friends in this arena!!
But, you will battle with them while using one of the characters that are available!! Each and every one has different skills and abilities, so find the best one that suits you!!

20 Characters available at the main character selection:
-Warrior
-Heavy Knight
-Assassin
-Paladin
-Werewolf
-Berserker
-Fighter
-Rogue
-Monk
-Wolf Master
-Archer
-Gunner
-Engineer
-Alchemist
-Ninja
-Vampire
-Priest
-Wizard
-Druid
-Necromancer

8 VIP Characters that are available upon purchasing the VIP pass:
-Cactus Boy
-Echo
-Pyro
-Artiminus
-Bomber Man
-Dragonoid
-King of Aquiria
-Omilucem
The VIP pass is available inside the shop, where you use your money to buy items that will help you during battles!!
Upon buying the VIP pass, not only you have access to the VIP characters, but also an access to the VIP fishing pond!!
Also, you can now go to the VIP shop, which contains greater items for bigger chance of victory!!
And hey! If you are lucky enough to have many wins, you can buy the VVIP pass to get to the VVIP shop!!

title: PVP Arena [By-RJthecrafter]
briefDescription: This is a classic PVP map but more fun. This is a two-player map, in this map 2 players select a team either Red or Blue ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a classic PVP map but more fun. This is a two-player map, in this map 2 players select a team either Red or Blue and start the game they have 3 lives. Both teams start with a strength=1 box (i.e. the basic one) on death they will respawn in their respective chamber if they have lives left and they will have a chance of getting either a Strength=2 or Strength=3 upon their luck. Read rules and instructions properly and everything will be completely fine.
Sincerely-RJthecrafter
Here are some images showing the insides of the game itself.
These are the Images of The PvP Arena by RJthecrafter, enjoy!!

title: Kit PvP (Story Mode BETA)
briefDescription: Kit PvP is a map that is what it says! It contains 11 Kits, 3 Maps, and 3 Mini Games! It is designed to be played with at ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Kit PvP is a map that is what it says! It contains 11 Kits, 3 Maps, and 3 Mini Games! It is designed to be played with at least three people, and is an excellent party game! You may record on this map as long as you provide the link to this page on your video.
I?m going to run you through all the stuff this map includes.
Kits
Mage
Comes with lots of potions!
Warrior
Iron armor, diamond sword, shield, basic survival outfit.
Barbarian
Super strong but Super slow! Equipped with FULL NETHERITE
Fisherman
Fly up to ledges with your elytra and reel in unsuspecting victims, and stab them with your fishing hook!
Ghost
Hard to see and catch, Fun to play as, though!
Archer
Just a guy with a bow and shield.
Superhero
Speed, leaping, strength, and slow falling! But watch out! You only have leather boots!
Demon
Burn down the entire map!
Magician
Cast spells on your opponents.
Mermaid
Throw or stab with your trident!
Demolition
Fire explosive rockets at your enemies while laughing like a madman.
MAPS
Flaming Crator

It may be misspelled, but this map is perfect for PvP! Parkour, structures, lava, you name it, it has it as long as it was in that list!
Ghost City

This city seems to be abandoned. Perfect place for homicide! (Wait, will that get me reported?). This map as plenty of places to take shelter, and even sewers! Ew?
Thick Forest

title: Home Sweet Home
briefDescription: Ahh... Home Sweet Home. Until it isn?t. Explore a giant house on a quest for mini games and emeralds. This map is different than ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ahh? Home Sweet Home. Until it isn?t. Explore a giant house on a quest for mini games and emeralds. This map is different than most as you have to search for the things to do, like a game of hide and seek. You can also join the official realm which should be linked somewhere around here.
Home Sweet Home is a mini-game realm/world that focuses on exploration. Run around a giant house searching for loot! Items and mini-games can be found anywhere from furniture, to snow globes, to aquariums! This map is also a joinable realm if you want to play with friends or fellow loot enthusiasts! The map can be a bit confusing but as long as you explore ALL of you surroundings everything will be okay.
There are currently 4 rooms with a total of 6 mini-games and our team is constantly updating the realm, with more updates coming here soon. There is also one hidden music disc for every game, and if you manage to find them all? well? something special will happen.
Current Mini-games:
Parkour Paradise: Over 3 hours of parkour! Trust me I sat through it, well actually I was sprinting,,, Includes a spawn lobby that branches out into different levels
Ceiling Fan Skyblock: Generator based Skyblock that includes public mines, plots, islands, shops, and multiple worlds to explore.
The Labyrinth: A gigantic maze inside a? couch? Contains four endings and a potion shop to unlock new areas.
Boat Racing: 2 race tracks, one looped and one finite, to try out! Includes auto boat reset system.
Jungle Hyjinx: Jungle Hyjinx is a survival mini-game set in, well a jungle duh.
Nether Factions: This is coming soon, but it will be free roaming of the entire nether.
Every game also has it?s own secrets and ways to earn emeralds. Spend emeralds on lottery tickets, crates or the shops.
There are currently four rooms to explore with more on the way, you just have to find them.
There will also be a Christmas Update on December 12th that is mostly for the realm.
Discord: https://discord.gg/msWSVeCSsY

title: Sword Battle Wars
briefDescription: Sword Battle Wars is a Last Man Standing Minigame. In this minigame, players have to fight each other with swords and kill each other until ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Sword Battle Wars is a Last Man Standing Minigame. In this minigame, players have to fight each other with swords and kill each other until one player is remaining. It also has a lot of cool and unique ways to get around the map, and some Game modes!
Normal Game mode:
Sword Battle Wars is a PvP Last man standing minigame with wooden swords. To kill someone, you must knock them of the edge into the floor (more specifically, y coordinate 4) or kill them with your sword. Every couple of seconds you get a random chance of getting a random enchantment (unbreaking, knockback, sharpness, and fire aspect) which will help you kill your opponents, you also have a random chance to get speed for 3 seconds which can help you either escape someone or get closer to someone.
Creepy Crawlers Game mode (Halloween Themed):
In Creepy Crawlers, spiders spawn almost everywhere around the city, your goal is to be the last player standing and fend of the spiders with stone swords and random enchantments (unbreaking, knockback, bane of arthropods or fire aspect). PvP is also turned off in this game, this means that you can team up with your friends to Conquer the spiders, but one by, everyone will die shortly after. Only one player can win in this mode, so make sure you?re the one who doesn?t get bitten to death, or fall from the Buildings!
(Spiders also get Speed, Strength, and resistance. Which makes them have more health, makes them stronger, and also makes them faster. Also this game mode is NOT recommended for low end devices.)
Mini-Game modes:
Mini-Game modes are settings you can activate and will be added for any game mode. For example? If you want to activate elytra for any game mode, then go ahead!
Trailer for sword battle wars coming to my YouTube channel sometime in the future.
I am the ORIGINAL creator of this world.
Settings:
In the settings, you can change where the wins appear, camera shake, time of day, etc. to your preference!

title: The KingKaden 1V1 Map (High Frames) (Very Pog)
briefDescription: The KingKaden 1V1 Map is a Minecraft Bedrock Edition 1V1 map focused on a smooth experience that's easy to use, yet highly configurable. It's compatible ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The KingKaden 1V1 Map is a Minecraft Bedrock Edition 1V1 map focused on a smooth experience that?s easy to use, yet highly configurable. It?s compatible on every single Bedrock Edition device (consoles, mobile, windows 10, etc.)
Showcase video: https://youtu.be/f2j6l7avVWE
You?ll first be spawned into an empty room with a button to start the game. Wait for all your friend(s) for before you start!

After you press start, you?ll be teleported into a room I like to call the kit hub. Inside the kit hub, you?ll have the option to choose between 4 different packages of armor, shields, healing, and weapons. (more options coming soon)

Once you have chosen your kit, you?ll be at the control panel. The control panel has everything you?ll need to customize your fight. From background music, to Golden Apple refill, it has everything you?ll need to have a perfect 1V1.

title: Lucky Block SkyWars
briefDescription: Lucky Block SkyWars is a game of skywars with lucky blocks! There are extra things such as skills, ridable bats, and more. Place lucky blocks ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Lucky Block SkyWars is a game of skywars with lucky blocks! There are extra things such as skills, ridable bats, and more. Place lucky blocks on the ground and break them to get the loot! There are 4 skills/events and 4 types of lucky blocks. 2-8 players.
Lucky Block SkyWars has all the normal functions of sky wars with the added benefit of a map repair time of under 2 seconds (I can?t guarantee this depending on how bad your device is but it should be quick)!
Player Max:
Gameplay:
How to:
Credits:

title: Gun PVP
briefDescription: Once you spawn in go to the item portal to grab your guns. and then go to the arena portal and let the battle begin. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Once you spawn in go to the item portal to grab your guns. and then go to the arena portal and let the battle begin. ranging from floating islands to caves and secret tunnels you can spend hours playing this infinite deathmatch with friends. If you die don?t worry just hop right back into the action.
There are all kinds of weapons and equipment in this fun battle field. you are surely never going to run out of ways to end your opponent.
made by therealpyroland
This map has no affiliation with PixelPoly Digital all credit goes to them for ActualGuns 3D
The world requires https://mcpedl.com/actualguns-3d/ or will not function. You must download actual guns 3d separately and add them to the world before playing.
World can be played without gun mod but there will be less of a weapon choice.
Server is best played with 2-8 people, although more people can make the game lag. there are 9 different guns ranging from a sniper to a shotgun.
get a full set of armor and fly down to the battle field with an elytra . structure damage is off along with random tick speed so the map will not change or need to be reset after each fight.
you can do whatever you want with the map but it is recommended to play with at least one other person, grab 1-3 guns, full armor, 2 totems, the potions, and a trident act as if its a death match with infinite respawns. there is no death or kill counter so if you want to get competitive you will have to do so separately.
item room : items are sorted into 3 chests that refill indefinitely.

map overview 1 : map is 100?100 cube with 4 main biomes. including a castle in a forest, a nether temple in a nether themed biome, a sand biome with temple, a stone hills area with mineshaft. there are also smaller biomes spread out in-between the main ones.
map overview 2 : floating platforms allow for a good sniper position with decent cover.
spawn : spawn teleports to main arena and item room. this is where you respawn to easier get more items and go to arena.

title: Piglin PVP Practice And Waves

It has five waves of piglins, 1,3,5,10, and 3 piglin brutes for stage 5. it also has a pro stage where you fight ten piglin brutes. To start, jump into the portal and go in the room on the right. grab your kit and start the wave! I hope you enjoy this pvp map made by Lego Demonstrator!

title: 2P PVP Arena
briefDescription: Fight to the death in this 2 player PVP arena! Gear up and get ready to fight your friends in this map! Can you prevail? Well, ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Fight to the death in this 2 player PVP arena! Gear up and get ready to fight your friends in this map! Can you prevail? Well, you have to try it to find out! With a lobby, normal mode, and hard mode with interchangeable options onto what you can use in PVP and what you cannot, the fun will never end. You can play as many times as you would like! Love it or not, it is a great way to practice your PVP and let you or your friends show off PVP skills and strategies! Countless hours were put in this map to make it perfect just for you. This map was originally for me and my friend MinecraftFan705 to battle in, but I made a decision to turn it into a map. Make sure to make a copy of the world before you fight with your friends on it. Even if you don?t have friends who play Minecraft, you can still practice your skills on this, or change the map entirely!

title: PvP And Build Practice (v1.0.1)
briefDescription: PvP And Build PracticeDid you ever want to be a God in MINECRAFT? You found the right map.Filled with games (3 at the moment I ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
PvP And Build Practice
Did you ever want to be a God in MINECRAFT? You found the right map.
Filled with games (3 at the moment I will add more) you will become a professional, minecraft player.
Note: This Is In Early Beta.
This is the spawn:

On the left, you have the bridging/clutch game. There will be a ?Back To Spawn? button to go back. There is gonna be a reset button to reset the game and there will be buttons behing you to get some items and blocks, (example Enderpearls, Cobblestone);
On the right, you have the PvP game where you can choose what armor and swords you and your friend want.
The choices are:
? Leather Armor + Wooden Sword
? Chain Armor + Stone Sword
? Iron Armor + Iron Sword
? Diamond Armor + Diamond Sword
When you are done picking, there is a button you can hit to get to the 1v1 arena.
You will instantly get a speed boost and then you can begin.
Bridge/Clutch Game:
PvP Game: Check This Out To See How The Armor Works.

New Game:
Gapple
Gapple is a PvP game, in which you get full diamond armor and sword, and tons of golden apples. You will now fight your friend and you will also get speed 2. You can eat as much apples you want. (You get the help boost now when you are at spawn).

With that being said?
I have made SETTINGS.
You can now turn on different settings, such as:
? Music
? Effects
? Particles.

title: The Heist ? Guards vs. Thieves
briefDescription: The Heist - Guards vs. Thieves is a multi player combat map made by me where a team of thieves and guards battle for the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Heist ? Guards vs. Thieves is a multi player combat map made by me where a team of thieves and guards battle for the sake of the bank?s balance!
Welcome to The Heist ? Guards vs. Thieves! This is a multiplayer map for 2-6 players in which there are two teams: guards and thieves. The thieves attempt to steal the bank?s balance by using the items from a nearby loot chest, while the guards try to stop them from doing so.
This map contains multiple secret areas and chests within them. I have made this in 1.16.100, however I think it would work in 1.16.0 as well, but why would anyone stay in 1.16.0? Either way, this is all I have to say, literally. Have fun, and see you next time!
